emailTemplateUser:
Attached is a PDF copy of the online form you have submitted requesting copies of personal information held by the Ministry of Justice.

If we have all the details we need to start processing your request we will contact you with a reference number and our contact details.

If we need you to provide more details, we will contact you.

Do not reply to this email, it is for sending this acknowledgement only.
name: Request personal information
phaseText: This is a new service - your [feedback](https://eu.surveymonkey.com/r/G5SWVCT) will help us to improve it.
